topic.title: Creating a JSON Schema from Learned Document Structure

keywords.indexterm: Create JSON schema from learned document structure

body.p: When there is no JSON schema associated with a JSON document, can learn the document structure by parsing the document internally. This feature is enabled by the Learn on open document option that is available in the user preferences.
To create a JSON schema from the learned structure of a JSON document, follow these steps:

ol.li: Open the JSON document that will be used to create the schema.

Go to Document JSON Document Learn Structure
JSON Learn Structure ()). The Learn Structure action reads the mark-up structure of the current document. A Learn completed message is displayed in the application status bar when the action is finished.

Go to Document JSON Document Save Structure
JSON Save Structure and enter the file path for the JSON schema.
